content: Yes, it definitely is time for change! The beauty industry must recognize that diversity and inclusivity are essential in promoting healthy beauty ideals and providing representation for all women. Consumers have the power to demand this change by supporting brands that celebrate diversity and calling out those that do not. By doing this, we can make a meaningful impact on the industry and create a future where all women can feel beautiful and confident in their own skin, regardless of their race, size, age, or ability.
